name: Luna
title: Moon Rider
lore: Luna rides her tiger mount, fighting for the goddess Selemene. Her glaives and moonbeams are deadly.

lucentBeam.name: Lucent Beam
lucentBeam.description: Calls a beam of lunar energy to damage and mini-stun a target.

moonGlaives.name: Moon Glaives
moonGlaives.description: Luna's glaives bounce between enemies, dealing reduced damage with each bounce.

lunarBlessing.name: Lunar Blessing
lunarBlessing.description: Grants bonus damage to Luna and nearby allies, plus extra night vision.

eclipse.name: Eclipse
eclipse.description: Calls down a barrage of moon beams that strike nearby enemies randomly.
